amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being expended on specific elements of the National Security Personnel System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds appropriated by the Act from being used to waive or modify regulations promulgated under chapter 43, 71, 75, or 77 of title 5, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
